__TOC__


List of main components being tested on the smoketesting infrastructure for every image and people that should be contacted if escalation/support is required.

The general rule is: when a problem appears in the given component, the order of contact should be:
1. Management
2. Landers
3. Developers

The best way to proceed is to inform all people in the chain - this way we ensure that there is no one left out from the loop.
